original_title: David Lee Roth : Napalm Up Yo Ass - The Complete Video Collection 1978-1994
overview: Collection of promo clips featuring David Lee Roth, with and without Van Halen, running from 1979 to the solo stuff up to 1994.
title: David Lee Roth : Napalm Up Yo Ass - The Complete Video Collection 1978-1994
